article.title: CCIR
article.paragraph: CCIRis a four-letter abbreviation that may stand for:

list.listitem: Campaign for Comprehensive Immigration Reform, a Washington, DC organization for immigrant rights
California Coalition for Immigration Reform, a California political advocacy group for immigration reduction
Canadian Centre for Investigative Reporting, produces thoroughly researched reporting in the public interest

Comit consultatif international pour la radio, a forerunner of the ITU-RCCIR 601, the former name of a broadcasting standard promulgated by the CCIRCCIR (selcall)CCIR-tones, A selective calling system used in some radio communications systems in some European countriesCCIR-1kandCCIR-2k, noise weighting standards for audio signals
Commander critical information requirement, a term in the US military
